name: Dispyria
description:
Welcome to Dispyria - a land beset by Eldritch horrors! Submitted for Ludum Dare 38.

Hi! If you liked this game, I would humbly ask you to check out the Kickstarter I'm running to try to get this game made into a full release! Even if you can't support this project, thanks for playing, and thanks for taking part in Ludum Dare!
